data.name: Untrue New World
data.detailed_description:
Evolutionary breeding loop VRRPG "Untrue New World"

About This World Part 1 : Pixie

.
  • Let's raise a cute little creature called a pixie.
  • Pixies become stronger and evolve depending on how they are raised.
  • It's okay if a pixie dies, you can re-grow a new one.
  • If you think you have failed to raise a pixie, you can discard it for free.
  • Everything about Pixie is at your disposal.

About This World Part 2 : The City

.
  • For some reason, many pixies have left the city.
  • Bring back the pixies that have left the city by any means necessary.
  • The more prosperous the city, the more useful it becomes.
  • If there are any pixies in town that you don't need, please contact us at any time.
  • Everything in the city is at your disposal.

About This World Part 3 : Justice

.
  • Let's follow justice and defeat evil.
  • Justice will never be killed. You can start over again and again.
  • Anything that stands in the way of justice becomes evil.
  • If it is justice, nothing else matters.
  • All of justice is at your disposal.

"This is merely a story in which you are deceived by justice, the world, and me."

data.supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
